name: ICA Sneaking Suit
description: To show them age hasn't slowed you down one bit, use this cutting-edge stealth suit. Install it for Peacock or replace a tactical suit of your choice.

options.name: Ground Zeroes Blue
options.tooltip: Ground Zeroes-style blue with black features, green straps and yellow highlights.

options.name: Peacock Addon
options.tooltip: Install the suit to your game as an addon without replacing existing suits. This will only work if you're playing with Peacock.

english.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_SNEAKING_SUIT_DESC: With para-aramid Kevlar inlays, rubberized materials and specialized cutting-edge technology, this ICA high-grade stealth suit will keep you dry, quiet and on target.

french.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_SNEAKING_SUIT_DESC: Avec des incrustations de Kevlar para-aramide, des matériaux caoutchoutés et une technologie de pointe spécialisée, cette combinaison furtive ICA de haute qualité vous gardera au sec, silencieux et sur la cible.

italian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_SNEAKING_SUIT_DESC: Con inserti in Kevlar para-aramidico, materiali gommati e tecnologia specializzata all'avanguardia, questa tuta stealth di alta qualità ICA vi manterrà asciutti, silenziosi e sul bersaglio.

german.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_SNEAKING_SUIT_DESC: Mit Einlagen aus Para-Aramid-Kevlar, gummierten Materialien und spezieller Spitzentechnologie sorgt dieser hochwertige ICA-Tarnanzug dafür, dass Sie trocken und leise bleiben und Ihr Ziel nicht verfehlen.

spanish.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_SNEAKING_SUIT_DESC: Con incrustaciones de Kevlar para-aramida, materiales engomados y tecnología de vanguardia especializada, este traje sigiloso ICA de alta calidad le mantendrá seco, silencioso y en el blanco.

russian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_SNEAKING_SUIT_DESC: Благодаря вставкам из пара-арамидного кевлара, прорезиненным материалам и специализированным передовым технологиям, этот высококлассный стелс-костюм ICA позволит вам оставаться сухим, тихим и нацеленным на цель.
